title: A discourse of the use of images in relation to the Church of England and the Church of Rome in vindication of Nubes testium  against a pamphlet entitled The antiquity of the Protestant religion concerning images, directed against some leaves of that collection.
author: Gother, John, d. 1704.
notes: Written by John Gother.  Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
